clinex.title: CLINEX
clinex.description: Distributed clinical management system with multi-site support, designed to optimize patient, appointment, and professional management as an exercise in clean architecture and backend best practices.

kinecandia.title: Kinecandia Landing Page
kinecandia.description: Landing page for a kinesiologist and physiatrist, facilitating contact with potential patients and providing a clear presentation of services, profile, and testimonials.

teslo-shop.title: Teslo Shop
teslo-shop.description: Frontend for an E-commerce inspired by Tesla's design styles with search, filtering, and product management functionalities, implemented with React and TypeScript.
